column1: #text=Eliminating Boredom By The Book I had the day off work .
#text=I was glad of that but only a few hours into my day , I realized how bored I was .
#text=I had already cleaned my house and done everything I needed to do .
#text=I turned on the television , but I could n't find anything to watch .
#text=It was cloudy and rainy outside , so going outside was not the best option .
#text=I knew I needed to find something to do though and I thought that maybe it would be a great idea to find a new book to read .
#text=I decided to drive to the local library .
#text=I looked at all of the new books that they had on display .
#text=I found a book that really caught my eye and looked intriguing .
#text=I knew that I really wanted to read this book so I checked it out .
#text=The book was so interesting that I read and read and forgot what time it was .
#text=I was almost to the end of the book when I noticed it was already dark outside .
#text=I was amazed at how fast time had gone due to being caught up in a very interesting book .
#text=Going to the library to borrow a book had been a very great idea to cure my boredom .
